message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
Let's try a 52/48 split. I think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, the value decreases with each round. I'll accept a 52/48 split, but in my favor this time.
Let's meet in the middle with a 50/50 split. Inflation is eating into my share, so I'm willing to compromise.
